feedbackInstruction: Tsani sǝr kǝl kuɗaha ka gǝ kǝli labar. Maga yiɗƐ, gata mǝzi gyar ala yar whalƐ namtu yar ata mǝzi bui tǝngƐ akwa viyir labar ǝni.
feedbackSuccess: Yi godicini kadubar labar tǝgǝ li ni!
recordings: Labarir kudahu namtu ndƐ kǝrta kǝli
unsyncedRecordings: Labar nam kura dzugwi dzugwi tǝdar kurtǝ Kǝli
day: Ashina | {n} vǝr pathlu tara kwacini | {n} Vǝr hang tara kwacini
tryAgainLater: UsƐ ɓǝla jakti nkǝrti 'ya gadawm ahǝla saka nkidu laka
